channel.title: Riccardo M. Cefala
channel.description: Recent content on Riccardo M. Cefala

item.description: Ciao, I’m Riccardo. This is my website. Here I try to be authentic, keep it simple, and write about things that make me happy. You are a welcome guest. You can send me an email if you like. I code and build clouds. Once I helped build one that sold for a lot of money. We had such a great time. This is a picture of me I like. My wife took it in 2016 while in New York.
